package.name: qbo_bringup
package.description: The qbo_bringup package provides a unified launch system for bringing up the Qbo robot. It includes startup launch files that integrate hardware drivers, diagnostics, and audio nodes from the qbo_driver package. Additionally, it starts the smatch node, a central orchestrator responsible for monitoring and coordinating system startup, with future support planned for behavior management using SMACH.
package.author: zwolinski
